metadata.title: CVE-2011-0765 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description:
Unspecified vulnerability in lft in pWhois Layer Four Traceroute (LFT) 3.x before 3.3 allows local users to gain privileges via a crafted command line.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2011-0765` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

lft - 3.91-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: lft package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.91-1').
